com.soa.soap.message
Interface SOAPVersion

All Known Implementing Classes:
SOAP11, SOAP12
public interface SOAPVersion

Interface for obtaining characteristics of a particular SOAP version.

Since:
6.0

Method Summary
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getApplicationFault()
          Returns the QName of the element holding application specific fault information for the SOAP version.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getBody()
          Returns the QName of the body element of the SOAP version.
 java.lang.String getContentType()
          Returns the content type used for this SOAP version.
 java.lang.String getContentType(java.lang.String soapAction)
          Returns the content type used for this SOAP version.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getEnvelope()
          Returns the QName of the envelope element of the SOAP version.
 EnvelopeWriter getEnvelopeWriter()
          Returns an EnvelopeWriter that writes envelopes of this SOAP version.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getFault()
          Returns the QName of the fault element of the SOAP version.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getFaultCode(org.w3c.dom.Element fault)
          Returns the fault code for the given fault.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getFaultID()
          Returns the QName of the element holding the identifier of a fault for the SOAP version.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getFaultMessage()
          Returns the QName of the element holding the message associated with a fault for the SOAP version.
 java.lang.String getFaultString(org.w3c.dom.Element fault)
          Returns the fault description string for the given fault.
 FaultWriter getFaultWriter()
          Returns a FaultWriter that writes faults of this SOAP version.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getGeneralReceiverFaultCode()
          Returns the QName of the fault code for a general fault caused by the receiver of a message exchange.
 java.lang.String getGeneralReceiverFaultString()
          Returns the string message for a general fault caused by the receiver of a message exchange.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getGeneralSenderFaultCode()
          Returns the QName of the fault code for a general fault caused by the sender of a message exchange.
 java.lang.String getGeneralSenderFaultString()
          Returns the string message for a general fault caused by the sender of a message exchange.

          Returns the QName of the header element of the SOAP version.
 java.lang.String getNamespace()
          Returns the namespace of the SOAP version.
 java.lang.String getPrefix()
          Returns the default prefix used for identifying the namespace.
 SoapActionEncodingMethod getSoapActionEncodingMethod()
          Returns the encoding method for SOAP Action for this SOAP version.
 float getVersion()
          Returns a numeric representation of the version.
 

Method Detail

getVersion

float getVersion()
Returns a numeric representation of the version. Can be used for comparisons of versions.

Returns:
floating number representing the version.

getNamespace

java.lang.String getNamespace()
Returns the namespace of the SOAP version.

Returns:
Namespace of the SOAP version.

Returns the default prefix used for identifying the namespace.

Returns:

getEnvelopeWriter

EnvelopeWriter getEnvelopeWriter()
Returns an EnvelopeWriter that writes envelopes of this SOAP version.

Returns:
EnvelopeWriter for this version.

getFaultWriter

FaultWriter getFaultWriter()
Returns a FaultWriter that writes faults of this SOAP version.

Returns:
FaultWriter for this version.

getContentType

java.lang.String getContentType()
Returns the content type used for this SOAP version.

Returns:
Content type as a String.

getContentType

java.lang.String getContentType(java.lang.String soapAction)
Returns the content type used for this SOAP version. Includes the passed in SOAP action for SOAP versions that encode SOAP action in the content type.

Returns:
Content type as a String.

getSoapActionEncodingMethod

SoapActionEncodingMethod getSoapActionEncodingMethod()
Returns the encoding method for SOAP Action for this SOAP version.

Returns:
SoapActionEncodingMethod used.

getFaultCode

javax.xml.namespace.QName getFaultCode(org.w3c.dom.Element fault)
Returns the fault code for the given fault.

Parameters:
fault - Element holding the fault.
Returns:
The fault code QName, null if one cannot be found.

getFaultString

java.lang.String getFaultString(org.w3c.dom.Element fault)
Returns the fault description string for the given fault.

Parameters:
fault - Element holding the fault.
Returns:
The fault description string, null if one cannot be found.
